Title: Screaming Meemies
Writer: Meredith Averill, Mike Flanagan (created by), Shirley Jackson (based on the novel by)
Actors: Michiel Huisman, Carla Gugino, Henry Thomas, Elizabeth Reaser
Plot: While struggling to discern dreams from reality, Olivia fears for her children's safety, a motherly instinct Mrs. Dudley urges her to embrace.
